sentences.sContent: You said in your address that "developing excellence is a slow, painstaking process".
sentences.sContent_eng: You said in your address that "developing excellence is a slow, painstaking process".
sentences.sCn: 你在你的致词中说“发展卓越性是一个缓慢艰苦的过程”。

sentences.sContent: In order to transform their environment, he drew up the project with painstaking accuracy.
sentences.sContent_eng: In order to transform their environment, he drew up the project with painstaking accuracy.
sentences.sCn: 为了改造环境， 他苦心孤诣地制订了这个计划。

remMethod.val: pains(痛苦) + taking(花费…的) → 煞费苦心的
